attributes.action: Repeal any EU directive or regulation  which seeks to 'Harmonise' activities and laws throughout member countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'Harmony' is a pleasant concept but as practiced by the EU it brings everyone down to the same common denominator. Individual thought, each county's traditions, preferences, lifestyle and freedom are cast aside by an unelected dictatorship. We no longer govern ourselves but instead are subjects, in a region, of the all engulfing monolith that is the outdated, restrictive and thoroughly disreputable EU.
